AdaptiveCFL.description:
Adaptive CFL for time stepping component


Parameters
----------
type : typing.Literal['adaptive'] = adaptive
        min : <class 'float'> = 0.1
        max : typing.Optional[typing.Annotated[float, Gt(gt=0)]] = None
        max_relative_change : typing.Optional[typing.Annotated[float, Gt(gt=0)]] = None
        convergence_limiting_factor : typing.Optional[typing.Annotated[float, Gt(gt=0)]] = None
AdaptiveCFL.title: AdaptiveCFL

RampCFL.description:
Ramp CFL for time stepping component


Parameters
----------
type : typing.Literal['ramp'] = ramp
        initial : typing.Optional[typing.Annotated[float, Gt(gt=0)]] = None
        final : typing.Optional[typing.Annotated[float, Gt(gt=0)]] = None
        ramp_steps : typing.Optional[typing.Annotated[int, Gt(gt=0)]] = None
RampCFL.title: RampCFL

description:
Unsteady time stepping component


Parameters
----------
order_of_accuracy : typing.Literal[1, 2] = 2
        type_name : typing.Literal['Unsteady'] = Unsteady
        max_pseudo_steps : <class 'int'> = 100
    Maximum pseudo steps within one physical step.
steps : <class 'int'>
    Number of physical steps.
step_size : <class 'flow360.component.simulation.unit_system._Constrained'>
    Time step size in physical step marching,
CFL : typing.Union[flow360.component.simulation.time_stepping.time_stepping.RampCFL, flow360.component.simulation.time_stepping.time_stepping.AdaptiveCFL] = AdaptiveCFL(type='adaptive', min=0.1, max=1000000.0, max_relative_change=50.0, convergence_limiting_factor=1.0)

max_pseudo_steps.description: Maximum pseudo steps within one physical step.
max_pseudo_steps.title: Max Pseudo Steps

title: Unsteady
